solution_line_template: Monika spent {movie_cost_per}*{num_movies} = <<{movie_cost_per}*{num_movies}={movie_total}>>{movie_total} dollars at the movies.
Monika spent {num_bags}*{cost_per_bag} = <<{num_bags}*{cost_per_bag}={beans_total}>>{beans_total} dollars at the farmers market.
Throughout her day, Monika spent {mall_spent}+{movie_total}+{beans_total} = <<{mall_spent}+{movie_total}+{beans_total}={total_spent}>>{total_spent} dollars.
